title: Can't actually tell who I'd wanna see less when alone in the forest.

replies.body:
Its like in most anime's its the little one thats the actual monster, Like Vegeta/Nappa in DBZ, Nappa is big and intimidating like wolf but is dwarfed by vegeta's power. The same with Itachi/Kisame in naruto, Kisame looks like a big brutish warrior, and itachi is a thin little guy, yet he is by far the more terrifying.

The same is true for lamb/wolf, It'd be a lot more eerie and freaky to turn around and see lamb sitting still on a rock right behind you staring at you, than see wolf running through the forrest at you.

Luckily we don't have to think about this because they are always together.
Lamb seems the logical choice unless you want to die a slow and painful death.

list of champs id rather see pop out of a brush in the jungle over kindred

soraka
sona (if nobody ends up backing her up)
same with taric
yorick


that is all
Ofc you wanna see Wolf, they taste better than Lamb.
